name: Merlin's Tomb
description:
The Story

Merlin's Tomb is a game my team and I made in 42 hours, during the POD Game Jam .

In this game, you will be an invincible knight, defending Merlin's Tomb. You are equipped with a throw-able sword and a fire spell. The tomb will have 500 hp and you need to fight as long as you can!


It is compatible with every headsets compatible with Steam VR. It has been tested with an HTC Vive and a Lenovo Explorer. The game has been made with Unity and the SteamVR 2.0 plugin. All of the art has been made during the event, beside the music and the skybox.

This is compatible with Windows (64bits)

Controls

To play:

  • right trigger press :  throw sword
  • left trigger press : throw fireball
  • right trackpad press : aim for teleporting
  • right trackpad release : teleport
Tutorial

There is a tutorial, but it's in French. To start the game:

  • teleport towards the white smoke (the blocky looking one)
  • throw the sword 3 times
  • throw fireball 3 times
  • fight until the end...
End of the Game

When the tomb will be destroyed (and it will), the army of the dead will spawn. You are advised to turn off the game afterwards. If you want to replay the game, just restart the .exe.
